---
title: Event Teaser
---
Description: Short description and details about an upcoming event

## Status: ALPHA

### Used in:


### Required Variables
~~~
eventTeaser: {
  title: 
    type: string/required
  location: 
    type: string (address)/optional
  date: 
    type: string (date)/optional
  time: 
    type: string/optional
  description: 
    type: string/optional
}
~~~
